overview: Part 2 of what has been described as “his hottest video ever,” has international porn star and director, Chip Daniels, again working both sides of the camera, in “Tight Ends & Wide Receivers.” Still the Coach of the Tigers, a toned and buffed Daniels is hotter and more captivating than ever in a role that allows his masculine, yet sensitive, persona to serve as a role model for the oversexed young men of this small college football team as they amuse themselves by combining rough sports and hard sex. There are no wimps on this team.
title: Tight Ends & Wide Receivers 2
